dmca.title: Poet complains of copying
dmca.body:
Notice of Copyright

Mr C R Slater
[private] 
Newcastle upon Tyne
[private] 
England

I am the author and copyright holder of this below
poem, illegally displayed as shown, it has been on my
web site since 2003 and has been taken and reproduced
by a user with you

I write for three registered UK charities and they
provide me with free copyright on all my works.

I swear on oath and as a committed Christian too
(under penalty of federal prosecution for perjury that
I do own the copyright to the material designated
below.

Mr C R Slater

One of your users/customers has sadly posted a
"published copyright poem? of my own creation on your
server/web site, 

1.) the poem has been taken and used without my given
consent for it?s use (data theft)

2.) Copyright and anti theft legal warnings have been
ignored infringed and breached

3.) the data thief has falsified the author
information on your site (plagiarism)

4.) my written work has been left with out any
copyright warnings and is open to abuse on your server

5.) As long as my work is displayed there your company
and any hosting servers are liable for soliciting
traffic and potential interest to their service
without my given consent to do so.

if you do a search in Yahoo or Google search you will
see it is taken from my own web site at the given
URL?s without consent to do so and all IP addresses
logged as recorded by the site meter in use there. 

This poem was clearly taken by theft with full clear
knowledge to just what the fraudulent poet was doing. 

Not only is the poem copyright but it is published.
Please remove this poem as a matter of urgency. 

I do not consent to my poems being displayed by any
web site unless I personally place them there, this
ensures my work and web site is always ever unique in
it?s own right. 

I write for three UK registered charities and we have
already sued six bogus poets for plagiarism and data
theft on two particular poems. I hope to hear from you
on this as a matter of urgency. 

Poem displayed on your site is clearly marked on my
own web site at several locations below and taken
without my consent
http://www.quickegreets.com/love/love1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.com/javafree/love/love1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/love/love1.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/javafree/love/love1.htm

CRS
